Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a light-buff coloured pottery wine-jar, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior specifying the contents as [wine] of the western river.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389882) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389882)
